pageProduct.name: OGX Brazillian Keratin Therapy Ever Straight Shampoo 385mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OGX Brazilian Keratin Therapy Shampoo helps to strengthen and soften the hair.

OGX Ever Straightening+ Brazilian Keratin Therapy Shampoo
Why You Want It... This rich sulfate free shampoo formula with Brazilian coconut oil and keratin proteins will help smooth and strengthen your curly or wavy hair.
The smoothing shampoo features an exclusive blend of coconut oil, keratin proteins, avocado oil and cocoa butter to help strengthen and soften the hair, while helping to smooth the cuticle for strong tresses, adding a brilliant, luxurious glow and luminescent shine.


  • Keratin shampoo strengthens and smooths hair

  • Straightening formula is great for those looking to smooth wavy hair or maintain straight hair

  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Ever Straightening
• Brazilian Keratin Therapy Shampoo
• Smooths and Soften Hair


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Steareth-20, Amodimethicone, Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-47, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-37, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, CI 16035, CI 19140, CI 42090.

Directions

Apply shampoo generously to wet hair, massage into a lather through to ends, then rinse the hair thoroughly. After shampooing, follow with conditioner. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
